name: Red Riding Hoods Peril
description:
You are the little red riding hood, forever stuck. after you spilled the tamato soup you were spos to give to your grandmama.

You have no idea how long it took me just to implement the movement system, thats pretty much all this "game" has. I will be remastering this "game" however I will also be uploading a video on this "game" so if you would like to check out how I made this "game" go to https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCB96YHGXwWExSlR6qisqGCQ

and stay tunned.

ps. thank you so much for checking it out.
